Balderton Capital

Balderton Capital is a leading European venture capital firm exclusively focused on backing technology companies founded in Europe. With a long history of investing and supporting European founders, they provide substantial capital and hands-on support from seed stage to IPO.

Offices: London (United Kingdom), Paris (France), Berlin (Germany)

Investment Stages: Seed, Series A, Series B

Markets: Fintech, Healthtech, AI, SaaS, E-commerce, Consumer, Cybersecurity, Mobile Gaming, Transportation, Space Technology, Clean Energy, Food Tech

Founded Year: 2000

Investor Type: Venture Capital

Portfolio Companies: PhotoRoom, Revolut, Contentful, Depop, Dream Games, GoCardless, Darktrace, Wayve, Lindus Health, The Exploration Company, 32Co, Adludio, Agave Games, Aircall, Andjaro, Anytype,
